bonus: Find Common Seed or increase a plots Enrichment by 10.
Find Uncommon Seed or increase a plots Enrichment by 15.
Find Rare Seed or increase a plots Enrichment by 20.
You can immediately make a Nature/Arcana/Religion check to enrich a plot with a bonus equal to your Job Tier.
Find Very Rare Seed or increase a plots Enrichment by 25.
You can immediately make a Nature/Arcana/Religion check to enrich a plot with a bonus equal to your Job Tier. You can apply this bonus to two different plots or the same one twice.
Find Legendary Seed or increase a plots Enrichment by 30.
